name: Tricky Lane
description:
Tricky Lane is a game that will challenge your quick reflexes!

The aim of the game is to survive as long as possible within the lane by dodging the dark circles that move diagonally across the screen!

Collect the white squares to increase your score!

Tap the screen to change the direction of the disc!

Don't forget to check where you stand on the Game Center leaderboard and share with your friends!
